Name: Taxicab licenses.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to taxicab licenses.

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Transportation
This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
This Introduction was Amendment Proposed by Comm
This Introduction was Amended by Committee
A motion was made that this Introduction be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.
A motion was made that this Introduction be Approved by Council approved by consent Roll Call.
This Introduction was Sent to Mayor by Council
This Introduction was Hearing Held by Mayor
This Introduction was Signed Into Law by Mayor
This Introduction was Recved from Mayor by Council

Summary: This bill would change the tax on the transfer of a taxicab license from 5% of the consideration given for such transfer to 0.5% of the consideration given for such transfer.
Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

      Section 1.  Subdivision a of section 11-1402 of the administrative code of the city of New York is amended to read as follows:
      a. [On and after July first, nineteen hundred eighty] On or after the effective date of the local law that amended this subdivision, there is hereby imposed and there shall be paid a tax on each transfer of a taxicab license or interest therein, at the rate of [five percent] 0.5 percent of the consideration given for such transfer.
      ï¿½ 2. This local law takes effect immediately.


















NKA
LS 7075
3/6/2017
